Text: The Dungeons & Dragons Rules Cyclopedia is a 1991 book published by TSR, Inc., as a continuation of the basic edition of the "Dungeons & Dragons" fantasy role-playing game, which ran concurrently with "Advanced Dungeons & Dragons".
